messages.message: Hey team, I'm not sure how to add a group to a workspace to assign run reviews in a deployment. I recorded what I tried to do, but I still can't figure it out. Am I missing something here?

Update: I was able to see that you can add groups from the "Add members" window in the Workspace. I don't think this is very clear from a UX perspective. The "Add members" button doesn't seem like the button to click when you want to add a group to a workspace. Are there any plans to simplify the workflow?

@david.lee Is the confusion here more once you're in the Workspace settings page? Maybe we make a separate "Add groups" button beside the "Add members" button @Jessica

 I see that you clicked the "Add groups link" from the deployment configuration page which means that is working.

Yes, I think `Service Accounts` and `Groups` being grouped in with `Members` is confusing. It took me a while to figure out 1. How to create a new group and 2. How to add that group to the workspace I wanted, because no buttons or menus explicitly say `Groups`

Thanks for this feedback @david.lee! We had a number of discussions on how to represent and call members, service accounts and groups. It's fairly common practice to lump all under members based on our analysis of other platforms.

We'll keep monitoring for feedback like this and see if any changes need to be made! Copying all @Jessica @melissa.amos
